sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { useParams, Link } from "react-router-dom" import { orderService } from "../../services/orderService" function OrderDetails() { const { id } = useParams() const [order, setOrder] = useState(null) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const [error, setError] = useState("") useEffect(() => { fetchOrderDetails() }, [id]) const fetchOrderDetails = async () => { setLoading(true) try { const data = await orderService.getOrderById(Number.parseInt(id)) setOrder(data) } catch (error) { setError(error.message) } finally { setLoading(false) } } const handleCancelOrder = async () => { if (window.confirm("Are you sure you want to cancel this order?")) { try { await orderService.cancelOrder(order.id) // Refresh order details fetchOrderDetails() } catch (error) { setError(error.message) } } } if (loading) { return
Loading order details...
} if (error) { return
{error}
} if (!order) { return
Order not found
} return (
← Back to Orders

Order #{order.id}

{order.status}

Order Information

Order Date: {new Date(order.orderDate).toLocaleDateString()}
Claim Code: {order.claimCode}
Status: {order.status}
{order.processedDate && (
Processed Date: {new Date(order.processedDate).toLocaleDateString()}
)} {order.cancelledDate && (
Cancelled Date: {new Date(order.cancelledDate).toLocaleDateString()}
)}

Shipping Information

{order.shippingAddress}

Phone: {order.contactPhone}

{order.notes && (

Notes:

{order.notes}

)}

Order Items

{order.items.map((item) => (

{item.title}

by {item.author}

Qty: {item.quantity}
${item.unitPrice.toFixed(2)}
${item.subtotal.toFixed(2)}
))}
Subtotal: ${order.subtotal.toFixed(2)}
Tax (8%): ${order.tax.toFixed(2)}
Total: ${order.total.toFixed(2)}
{order.canCancel && ( )} Back to Orders
) } export default OrderDetails
